page.title: 09ENTERTAINMENTS, RHYL
page.content: The Little Theatre in Vale Road has a Children's Theatre Club and they perform an annual pantomime and summer musical. 2 amateur dramatic groups, the Liberty Players and the Little Theatre group, each perform 3 plays a year. The Coliseum and Gaiety Theatres on the Promenade are owned by the Council and have not enough seats to be able to pay wellknown artistes. In summer they have wrestling and family variety shows. The Council promised a new theatre would be built in the second stage of the Sun Centre but it has not yet been built. In the summer there is a daily Punch and Judy show near the clock tower. The Astra has 2 cinemas in one building and the Plaza Cinema is now a bingo hall and social club with snooker and pool rooms.
